title: Amnesty says Israel committing acts of genocide in Gaza. Here’s what to know.
description: The declaration by one of the world’s most prominent rights organizations is likely to intensify a debate that has raged for months over Israel’s conduct in Gaza.
author: Louisa Loveluck, Missy Ryan
excerpt: The declaration by one of the world’s most prominent rights organizations is likely to intensify a debate that has raged for months over Israel’s conduct in Gaza.
text: Amnesty International said in a report Wednesday that Israel is committing acts of genocide against Palestinians in Gaza.The declaration by one of the world’s most prominent rights organizations is likely to intensify a debate that has raged for months over how to characterize Israel’s military campaign against Hamas, which has killed tens of thousands of people and left much of Gaza in ruins.
html:
Amnesty International said in a report Wednesday that Israel is committing acts of genocide against Palestinians in Gaza.

The declaration by one of the world’s most prominent rights organizations is likely to intensify a debate that has raged for months over how to characterize Israel’s military campaign against Hamas, which has killed tens of thousands of people and left much of Gaza in ruins.
